instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME SETUP: Update 'tailwind.config.js' and 'index.css' to use the custom color palette defined in 'colors.palette'. The background MUST be #2e2f2b and cards #3a3c36.
2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to 'index.css' or 'index.html'. Configure Tailwind to use 'Barlow Condensed' for headings and 'Inter' for body.
3. LAYOUT: Implement the 'Game Selection' screen as the home page. When a game is selected, transition to the 'Builder' layout.
4. STATE MANAGEMENT: Use React Context or State to manage the 'Current Army' list, 'Selected Game', and 'Points Total'.
5. VALIDATION: Implement real-time validation logic. If (Hero Count > Points/375), show warning. If (Unit Cost > Total Points * 0.35), show error.
6. EXPORT: The 'Export HTML' button should generate a downloadable .html file with the specific dark theme background (#2e2f2b) inline styles.
7. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn UI components as a base but OVERRIDE their styles with the 'components' styles defined in this JSON. Do not use default white/black Shadcn cards.
8. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (e.g., 'game-card-grimdark', 'add-unit-btn', 'export-html-btn').
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
